overview: Slayed is making a big splash with it's first ever installment of the glamorous new series, Drip. This series brings you the wettest and wildest girl-on-girl action you'll find anywhere. Featured cover girls Ivy Wolfe and Vicki Chase are soaking wet and oozing sex. One dip in the pool together and all their inhibitions are washed away. Adriana Chechik, Scarlit Scandal, Eliza Ibarra, Charlotte Sins, Azul Hermosa and Kenzie Anne are all exploring life on the sapphic side.
title: Drip
